content.summary: A Senior Business Associate with a positive attitude, effective marketing abilities, and a good listener. Constantly seeking new concepts and challenges. Demonstrates strong leadership skills by leading teams in various roles. Has experience working with CRM systems like Hubspot and managing accounts on platforms such as LinkedIn, Upwork, and Freelancer.com.

experience.title: Leading Business Associate
responsibilities: Managing various online business accounts on LinkedIn, Lusha, Upwork, and Freelancing
Checking the entire database of clients on CRM
Preparing Business Proposals for clients as per their needs
Leading the Lead generation and International Business Team

experience.title: Senior Business Associate (Tech. Team)
responsibilities: Browsing and reading on various platforms for business growth
Keeping a check on bidding from all accounts
Creating proposals for various projects of the company

experience.title: Business Associate (Sales and Marketing)
responsibilities: Processing of all account payable documents
Resolving client queries through E-mails or call

experience.title: Business Executive (Sale)
responsibilities: Handled the companys online presence â€“ regularly updated the companys website and various social media accounts

candidate_attributes_inferred.academic_performance: MBA from Jaypee Business School, JIIT University and B.com from Delhi University
candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Constantly seeking new concepts and challenges
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Resolving client queries through E-mails or call
candidate_attributes_inferred.standout_traits: Positive attitude, effective marketing abilities, good listener, friendly nature, confidently accepts challenges
